title: Border, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: In the center of the design is a blossom flanked by stylized floral and foliated forms in connecting overall serpentine design. Cordonnet; Fond: petite réseau. Modes: portes, enchainettes, St. Esprit avec Rangs Clairs, gaze quadrillée, réseau mouché.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1700–50.
1700–50. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-65.
